message: Here is how it can be done quite fast I think.. havent test it yet, but its trivial https://gist.github.com/1052052

Ok here is what i think aslo needed here a lot... SOCIAL_AUTH_NEW_USER_REDIRECT_URL is great but how about SOCIAL_AUTH_ASSOCIATED_USER_REDIRECT_URL?? Case, lets say When a new user registers using their Social account.. cool... I want to ask them to set a Password, maybe some other questions, which are just for the newbies for my site.. But how about once they are in... and Later down the road, they wanna Associate their Twitter Account while they are on their Profile Page... Now I dont want user to be Redirected to REDIRECT_DEFAULT, which will be lets say the Main Page, I want User to be Recirected back to PROFILE page, so they can see Successfully they associated their OLD account with the NEW social account..
same problem with Disconnect now that i realized...
good feedback, I'll take a look
Take a look to this changeset https://github.com/omab/django-social-auth/commit/c5d08473470b7c8d71a2cb1f63a69dfc1fc11778
